Title: Extends the authorization to have an occupancy tax in the town of Putnam Valley, in the county of Putnam
Summary: Extends the authorization to have an occupancy tax in the town of Putnam Valley, in the county of Putnam.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 339 of the laws of 2023 amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the town of Putnam Valley, in Putnam county, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
